## MapViewFog.reset() method

Sets the fog depending on the \[\[Theme\]\] instance provided. This function is called when a theme is loaded. Fog is added only if the theme contains a fog definition with a: - `color` property, used to set the fog color. - `startRatio` property, used to set the start distance of the fog as a ratio of the far clipping plane distance.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reset(theme: Theme): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md) | A \[\[Theme\]\] instance. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
